name: TAF Short
description: TAF Short: Terminal aerodrome forecast (â‰¤12 hours)

editable.defaultsFunction: () => { const now = new Date(); const d = String(now.getUTCDate()).padStart(2, '0'); const h = String(now.getUTCHours()).padStart(2, '0'); const addHours = (hours) => { const future = new Date(now.getTime() + hours * 60 * 60 * 1000); return String(future.getUTCDate()).padStart(2, '0') + String(future.getUTCHours()).padStart(2, '0'); }; return [{ text: d + h + '/' + addHours(6), description: '6 hours validity', type: 'datetime' }, { text: d + h + '/' + addHours(9), description: '9 hours validity', type: 'datetime' }, { text: d + h + '/' + addHours(12), description: '12 hours validity', type: 'datetime' }]; }
